channel.title: Looking For A Server!
channel.description:
Well im from Gamerz Heaven and im looking for someone with high upload and a nice comp to host the server and also a developer for it. I figured this would be a great way to start a community. Or the person could host and develope would be even better because we wouldnt have to wait for stuff to be updated. Also the server needs to be atleast 22/7 if not i will not take the offer. My website is www.ghforum.net this is not at all looking to be a advertisment for my site im just looking for a server staff.
Any questions contact me via msn: ownedggre@hotmail.com
Also my email is : chyboz@hotmail.com
Thanks, GH Staff[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 11, 2008, 03:03:42 PM[/size][hr]*STILL LOOKING NEED PEOPLE ASAP*
